languages.text: "Когда Азуриани хочется отдохнуть с близкими, мы плетем образы из наших голосов. Каждый вносит что-то свое, пока не сложится гармоничный гобелен из уникальных звуков".

"When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."
languages.original_text: "Когда Азуриани хочется отдохнуть с близкими, мы плетем образы из наших голосов. Каждый вносит что-то свое, пока не сложится гармоничный гобелен из уникальных звуков".

traits.locale_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to spend a time of rest with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the weave becomes a harmonious tapestry in which no two sounds are the same."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to spend a time of rest with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the weave becomes a harmonious tapestry in which no two sounds are the same."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Lorsque nous souhaitons nous reposer et passer du temps avec nos semblables les plus proches, nous tissons des images avec nos voix. Chacun ajoute sa touche personnelle, jusqu'à ce que la mélodie devienne une tapisserie harmonieuse formée de différents sons entrelacés. »
languages.original_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque nous souhaitons nous reposer et passer du temps avec nos semblables les plus proches, nous tissons des images avec nos voix. Chacun ajoute sa touche personnelle, jusqu'à ce que la mélodie devienne une tapisserie harmonieuse formée de différents sons entrelacés. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando los Asuryani queremos pasar tiempo con nuestros seres queridos, tejemos imágenes con nuestras voces. Cada uno añadimos algo propio hasta que la melodía se convierte en un tapiz armonioso creado con distintos sonidos».
languages.original_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los Asuryani queremos pasar tiempo con nuestros seres queridos, tejemos imágenes con nuestras voces. Cada uno añadimos algo propio hasta que la melodía se convierte en un tapiz armonioso creado con distintos sonidos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “当阿苏焉的子嗣想要休息，或是想和他们最亲近的族人们团聚时，我们会利用声音编织出各种各样的景象。每个人都会加入自己的旋律，直到最后的交响包含形形色色的和声为止。”
languages.original_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."

traits.locale_text: “当阿苏焉的子嗣想要休息，或是想和他们最亲近的族人们团聚时，我们会利用声音编织出各种各样的景象。每个人都会加入自己的旋律，直到最后的交响包含形形色色的和声为止。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アシュリヤーニが休息をとり、親しい親族と一緒に過ごしたいと願うとき、私たちは声でイメージを紡ぎ出す。メロディーが、さまざまな音で織り成された調和のとれたタペストリーになるまで、それぞれが自分の何かを加えるのです」
languages.original_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリヤーニが休息をとり、親しい親族と一緒に過ごしたいと願うとき、私たちは声でイメージを紡ぎ出す。メロディーが、さまざまな音で織り成された調和のとれたタペストリーになるまで、それぞれが自分の何かを加えるのです」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn Asuryani sich ausruhen und Zeit mit ihren engsten Verwandten verbringen möchten, dann weben wir mit unseren Stimmen Bilder. Jeder fügt etwas eigenes hinzu, bis die Melodie zu einem harmonischen Gobelin wird, gewebt aus unterschiedlichen Klängen."
languages.original_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Asuryani sich ausruhen und Zeit mit ihren engsten Verwandten verbringen möchten, dann weben wir mit unseren Stimmen Bilder. Jeder fügt etwas eigenes hinzu, bis die Melodie zu einem harmonischen Gobelin wird, gewebt aus unterschiedlichen Klängen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Asuryani, dinlenmek ve yakın soydaşlarıyla zaman geçirmek istediğinde seslerimizle imgeler dokuruz. Her birimiz kendimizden bir şey katar ve melodinin farklı seslerden örülü, ahenkli bir halı hâline gelmesini sağlarız."
languages.original_text: "When an Asuryani wishes to rest and spend time with their closest kin, we weave images with our voices. Each of us adds something of our own, until the melody becomes a harmonious tapestry woven from different sounds."
